name: 4 Doors
description:
This is a short horror game with no story to tell. Your job is to find 4 keys and escape the monster that hunts you. With every key you collect, the monster gets faster, will you get to the exit?

FEATURES:

  • local multiplayer, split-screen (up to 2 players max)
  • less than 10 minutes of gameplay (just finish the game in five minutes and never play it again, what a deal)
  • easy gameplay (just collect the god damned keys)
  • keys spawn every time in different locations
  • simple controls (just use ARROWS for player 1 and WASD for player 2)
  • simple graphics (even your pc can run this)
  • size of 18MB

Even tho it looks simple, a lot of effort went into this, I have spent many hours to make this, so I really hope you enjoy this, but don't expect something big, I am still a beginner at programming a game.

!!! All sound effects and music is not made by me or mine, but I forgot where I got it from. !!!
